wordpressPost.title: Årets TV-reklame!
wordpressPost.content:
Directed by Magnus Rye
Produced by Anders Pedersen & Magnus Rye
Photography by Håvar Karlsen
B-Foto: Espen Guldbrandsen
Edited by Magnus Rye (additional editing by Steffen Sæther-Larsen)
Costumes & Props by Cecilie Elena G. Hansen
VFX by Mads Hornsletten & Steffen Sæther-Larsen @ Øyedrops
Music by Marius Ergo @ Øyedrops
SFX by Rick Marr @ Electrik Effects
Actors: Julius Vidarssønn Langhoff, Mathias Storm Strøm Stoltenberg, Jesper Herning and Jonas Urstad.
DIT by Magnus Owe
Grip by Andreas Nesse
Lights by Jørgen Werner, Jo Bergersen & Stig Indrebø
Assistant: Bjørnar Kristensen
